Headline: #35 31st Temporary Reroute at 31st/Lock
ShortDescription: #35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 31st, Loomis and Archer, due to, street blockage near 31st/Lock

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 43rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at 43rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
